definitions.text: that part of the central nervous system that includes all the higher nervous centers; enclosed within the skull; continuous with the spinal cord

examples: he's got plenty of brains but no common sense

definitions.text: that which is responsible for one's thoughts and feelings; the seat of the faculty of reason
examples: I couldn't get his words out of my head

definitions.text: someone who has exceptional intellectual ability and originality
examples: he's smart but he's no Einstein

definitions.text: the brain of certain animals used as meat
